import React,{useState} from 'react' import "./CartItem.css" const CartItem=({todo,Delete})=>{ var total; total=(parseInt(todo.price))*(todo.myquantity); console.log("myQuantity type = ",total); return(
{todo.name}
Price
{todo.price}
Quantity
{todo.myquantity}
Total
{total}
) } export default CartItem;
